title: High Ping
body:
I have 330 MS when i go in normal game, also i have 60 - 70 ms now 350-500, how to fix? 
And yeah my network 23 PING - 19.18 Download Speed - 1.45 Upload Speed

Sry for bad eng :)

replies.body:
Don't worry about the English, it completely made sense!

If you are consistently experiencing these ping spikes, we need to figure out what is causing them.  The best way to do that is for you to use our [Log Reader Tool](https://support.riotgames.com/hc/en-us/articles/209765743).  It will analyze your past few games, and let you know if it finds an issue with your connection.  If it does, it'll provide some solutions as well!

I hope this helps!  If it still doesn't resolve anything for you, reply back and let me know!
